column4: can anyone help me with getting beryl working? it runs, but the window manager doesnt work
beryl IS a window manager, so i'm not sure how one can work and not the other
no, window manager. there's no title bar, cant move the windows, etc
do the windows have borders?
no
if you hold alt and click on a window and drag can you move it?
ive had to switch to the gnome window manager to use the desktop
no
gnome is desktop environment. metacity is its window manager. beryl is another window manager that most people run with gnome. dont try to run it alone or you wont have a menu to open up any programs
what do i do in the theme manager
pick one
nope, still no titlebars
wait, how do i select it? i dont see an apply button or anything once i have it selected
the ok button is all there is
it applies as soon as you select it
i dont see an ok button, just quit
ok then that's it
ok then it didnt work
it applies when you pick it and there is no cancel. you could hit the X and thatd do it
what window decorator is selected?
the only option, standard beryl (emerald)
reload window decorator?
no effect whatsoever
